mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS strain_id, d.id AS disease_id, s.strain_international_no AS strain_international_no, d.disease_name_zh AS disease_name_zh FROM dms_bacteria_strain s, dms_disease_info d, dms_disease_relations_strain r WHERE s.id = r.strain_id AND d.id = r.disease_id

SELECT s.id AS strain_id, d.id AS disease_id, s.strain_international_no AS strain_international_no, d.disease_name_zh AS disease_name_zh FROM dms_bacteria_strain s, dms_disease_info d, dms_disease_relations_strain r WHERE s.id = r.strain_id AND d.id = r.disease_id AND (d.disease_name_zh LIKE concat("%",#{keyword},"%") OR s.strain_international_no LIKE concat("%",#{keyword},"%"))
